graph_title: Number of publications on conservation and management of soils and terrestrial ecosystems

SDG_GOAL: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
SDG_TARGET: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species
SDG_INDICATOR: Number of publications on conservation and management of soils and terrestrial ecosystems
indicator_level: Process (offer information about the effort, resources, decisions and actions that the UPO is making to comply with the SDG)
